action.action-desc: Mr. Gosar (for himself, Mr. Franks of Arizona, Mr. Amodei, Mr. Gallego, Mr. Grijalva, and Ms. Sinema) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act for purposes of making claims under such Act based on exposure to atmospheric nuclear testing, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Downwinders Compensation Act of 2017.

section.header: Inclusion under the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act
section.text: Section 4(b)(1) of the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act (42 U.S.C. 2210 note; Public Law 101–426) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking that portion of; and
by striking that consists of townships 13 through 16 at ranges 63 through 71; and

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (C), by inserting all acreage in any county all or part of which is located in before that part.
